data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki III - Juna's "Crossbell Cheer!" Costume
data.detailed_description:
Change Juna's costume to her Crossbell Cheer! outfit.

*These items can be obtained from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
data.about_the_game:
Change Juna's costume to her Crossbell Cheer! outfit.

*These items can be obtained from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
data.short_description: Change Juna's costume to her Crossbell Cheer! outfit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
